title: Terrible Packet Loss This Month
body: When in game every 1-2 minutes game game will essentially freeze with a minor spike in fps. After 2-10 seconds the game will resume. This only happens on my desktop. I'm not really sure where else to turn at this point. Sorry I'm a novice when it comes to fixing computer problems.

replies.body: The first thing we want      to find out is if this is an fps or actual packet loss problem.  Run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) so we can get a deeper look.  Let me know the results!
